channel.title: New king is more stupid then ever
channel.description: In late game, you just lose if cult/unseen have evil king and 1 more evil member, even if bd got majority. It's just make king faction count like 3 people with royal finger. Game is just decided by king faction unless you auto exe every king d4.

item.title: New king is more stupid then ever
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
That’s because non-BD king is still more likely than BD king. I already made suggestions on how to fix that without effecting evil king rate.

Read full topic
item.source: New king is more stupid then ever

item.title: New king is more stupid then ever

item.description:
Well, you are right, but they should get executed every d4, that’s the best tactic for BD.

item.title: New king is more stupid then ever
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
I haven’t seen ANY Kings out since the latest patch. At this point I feel like it isn’t even a problem as king are only executed when people have a good reason to.

Read full topic
item.source: New king is more stupid then ever

item.title: New king is more stupid then ever
item.dc:creator: sunchamber
item.description:
This is the tradeoff of the new king. Completely and utterly useless early game, autowin lategame.

New meta (I imagine) is to kill the King ASAP before he can use any of his executes. There is no reason at all for BD to claim to king or trust him in any capacity, and it’s incorrect to allow a killing class of unknown allegiance live. New patch effectively crushed BD’s communication network.

All of my games so far have been boring as shit and I will probably not be playing until they revert most of the important changes.

Read full topic
item.source: New king is more stupid then ever
